New Brisbane coach Kevin Walters believes he can get the best out of Tevita Pangai jnr next season and is confident Joe Ofahengaue and Matt Lodge will remain with the club.
Walters oversaw his first… [+4357 chars]

articles.title: 'Difficult legal question': Jarryd Hayne rape trial takes curious turn - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: The jury has been sent home in a shock development on the opening day of the Jarryd Hayne rape trial.
articles.content:
Jarryd Hayne's rape trial was delayed after the jury was sent home on Monday. Pic: AAP

articles.title: Marsh’s Test hopes fade fast as crucial deadline rapidly approaches - Fox Sports
articles.description: Mitch Marsh has effectively ruled himself out of playing any international cricket this summer declaring he won’t be able to bowl until the middle of the Big Bash.
articles.content:
The all-rounder is still recovering from a syndesmosis injury suffered in the opening match of the Indian Premier League in September.
